channel.description: The main purpose of this layer is to implement repository interfaces which were defined in Domain layer. If you need to customize the entity classes to fit the infrastructure (like EF) or optimize the DB, you can do it here. Itâ€™s named {namespace}.{feature}.{infrastructure}.
